data.title: Jerry Roberts
data.meta_description: Jerry Roberts was a guidance and control systems engineer on NASA's first spacecrafts and went on to work on America's space program for more than three decades. He is now a consulting engineer with Stofiel Aerospace of St. Louis which is developing
data.text: Jerry Roberts was a guidance and control systems engineer on NASA's first spacecrafts and went on to work on America's space program for more than three decades. He is now a consulting engineer with Stofiel Aerospace of St. Louis which is developing a new orbital launch system.
